fieldUpdates.name: Add Account Name to Opp Name

fieldUpdates.name: Approval Status Update to Submitted

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( AND( Start_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),1,1), Start_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),3,31) ), AND( End_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),1,1), End_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),3,31) ) ), Amount, IF( AND( Start_Date2__c < DATE(YEAR(Today()),1,1), AND( End_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),1,1), End_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),3,31) ) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c ) * ABS(((DATE(YEAR(Today()),1,1))-Start_Date2__c)-Flight_Length__c), IF( AND( AND( Start_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),1,1), Start_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),3,31) ), End_Date2__c > DATE(YEAR(Today()),3,31) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c ) * ABS((End_Date2__c - DATE(YEAR(Today()),3,31))-Flight_Length__c), IF( AND( Start_Date2__c < DATE(YEAR(Today()),1,1), End_Date2__c > DATE(YEAR(Today()),3,31) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c) * ABS(((End_Date2__c - DATE(YEAR(Today()),4,1))+(DATE(YEAR(Today()),1,1))+1-Start_Date2__c)- Flight_Length__c), 0 ))))
fieldUpdates.name: Calculate Q1 Running Revenue

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( AND( Start_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),4,1), Start_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),6,30) ), AND( End_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),4,1), End_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),6,30) ) ), Amount, IF( AND( Start_Date2__c < DATE(YEAR(Today()),4,1), AND( End_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),4,1), End_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),6,30) ) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c ) * ABS(((DATE(YEAR(Today()),4,1))-Start_Date2__c)-Flight_Length__c), IF( AND( AND( Start_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),4,1), Start_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),6,30) ), End_Date2__c > DATE(YEAR(Today()),6,30) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c ) * ABS((End_Date2__c - DATE(YEAR(Today()),6,30))-Flight_Length__c), IF( AND( Start_Date2__c < DATE(YEAR(Today()),4,1), End_Date2__c > DATE(YEAR(Today()),6,30) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c) * ABS((((End_Date2__c - DATE(YEAR(Today()),7,1))+(DATE(YEAR(Today()),3,31))-Start_Date2__c))- Flight_Length__c), 0 ))))
fieldUpdates.name: Calculate Q2 Running Revenue

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( AND( Start_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),7,1), Start_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),9,30) ), AND( End_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),7,1), End_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),9,30) ) ), Amount, IF( AND( Start_Date2__c < DATE(YEAR(Today()),7,1), AND( End_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),7,1), End_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),9,30) ) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c ) * ABS(((DATE(YEAR(Today()),7,1))-Start_Date2__c)-Flight_Length__c), IF( AND( AND( Start_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),7,1), Start_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),9,30) ), End_Date2__c > DATE(YEAR(Today()),9,30) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c ) * ABS((End_Date2__c - DATE(YEAR(Today()),9,30))-Flight_Length__c), IF( AND( Start_Date2__c < DATE(YEAR(Today()),7,1), End_Date2__c > DATE(YEAR(Today()),9,30) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c) * ABS((((End_Date2__c - DATE(YEAR(Today()),10,1))+(DATE(YEAR(Today()),6,30))-Start_Date2__c))- Flight_Length__c+2), 0 ))))
fieldUpdates.name: Calculate Q3 Running Revenue

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( AND( Start_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),10,1), Start_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),12,31) ), AND( End_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),10,1), End_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),12,31) ) ), Amount, IF( AND( Start_Date2__c < DATE(YEAR(Today()),10,1), AND( End_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),10,1), End_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),12,31) ) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c ) * ABS(((DATE(YEAR(Today()),10,1))-Start_Date2__c)-Flight_Length__c+2), IF( AND( AND( Start_Date2__c >= DATE(YEAR(Today()),10,1), Start_Date2__c <= DATE(YEAR(Today()),12,31) ), End_Date2__c > DATE(YEAR(Today()),12,31) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c ) * ABS((End_Date2__c - DATE(YEAR(Today()),12,31))-Flight_Length__c), IF( AND( Start_Date2__c < DATE(YEAR(Today()),10,1), End_Date2__c > DATE(YEAR(Today()),12,31) ), (Amount / Flight_Length__c) * ABS((((End_Date2__c - DATE(YEAR(Today()),12,31))-1+(DATE(YEAR(Today()),9,30))-Start_Date2__c))- Flight_Length__c), 0 ))))
fieldUpdates.name: Calculate Q4 Running Revenue

rules.description: Alert Emanuela Ali when CBD campaign is live
Once a programmatic campaign ends or cancels, the PSM gets an email alert asking them to complete the programmatic section.
Once a programmatic opportunity updates to closed/won, the PSM gets an email alert asking them to enter the Voiced Budget.

rules.fullName: If the Total Ordered Amount %28standard Amount%29 is Changed%2C List the Total in a Separate Field
rules.description: If the Total Ordered Amount (standard Amount) is Changed, List the Total in a Separate Field. This is to allow roll-up summaries to the Account since Multi-Currency doesn't allow for roll-ups.
Email alert for Dan Fennel whenever the Closed/Lost reason is either Inventory/Scale Concern or Site List
Notify AM when the opportunity has been submitted to Ad Manager.
Mark off field that Opp. is a clone, thus preventing Send Sold Campaign Email will not send immediately.
Add the account name to opportunity names

rules.fullName: Opportunity %28Advertising%29 - SEND Daily Emails to AM about Placeholder Product
rules.description: This is the second of two workflow rules that work together to send a daily email alert to the AM if there is a placeholder product on an opportunity with a probability >= 50%

rules.fullName: Opportunity %28Advertising%29 - SET Daily Emails to AM about Placeholder Product
rules.description: This is the first of two workflow rules that work together to send a daily email alert to the AM if there is a placeholder product on an opportunity with a probability >= 50%

rules.fullName: Opportunity %28Advertising%29 - Update Close Date when Won%2FLost
rules.description: Workflow rule for opportunities with record type "Advertising" to always time stamp the Close Date when Won/Lost to the current date regardless of if there was a value previously.
Notify CSM when probability is at 25%.
Notify AM when probability is at 50%.
When Partner or GumGum Out By Convenience is not set, send an email notification.
Alert Emanuela Ali when Pharma campaign is live
When Pledge is updated, automatic update to the pledge probability
Alert the PSM, Seller, Sellers Manager, AM, and Ian Barbo when a Programmatic Opp is live
Alert the PSM, Seller, Sellers Manager, AM, and Ian Barbo when a Programmatic Opp is live
Helps verify if the Proposal Team is creating their proposals on time
rules.formula: AND( Probability = 0.25, RecordType.DeveloperName = "Advertising", TEXT(Channel__c) = "Direct", ISBLANK(RFP_Submitted_Date__c ), Now() > RFP_Due_Date__c)

rules.description: When a Publisher Sales opportunity reaches 90%, notify the appropriate individuals.
Send an alert any time a 250k+ RFP is received
Send an alert any time a 500k+ RFP is received
workflow to alert publisher team that a risky creative campaign has launched
existing business closes opportunity with $250k+ ordered amount
rules.formula:
AND( Amount >= 250000, OR( RecordType.Name = "Advertising", RecordType.Name = "Verity - Demand", RecordType.Name = "Verity - Platform", RecordType.Name = "Verity - Publisher"
), !CONTAINS(Account_Name_as_String__c,"Apple Inc."), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed/Won"), ISCHANGED(StageName), $User.Bypass_Opportunity_Validation__c = False, OR( ISPICKVAL ( Type , "Existing Business"), ISPICKVAL ( Type , "Renewal" ), ISPICKVAL ( Type , "Renewal Business") ) )

rules.description: existing business closes opportunity with less than $250k ordered amount
rules.formula:
AND ( Amount < 250000 , Amount > 1 , OR( RecordType.Name = "Advertising", RecordType.Name = "Verity - Demand", RecordType.Name = "Verity - Platform", RecordType.Name = "Verity - Publisher"
), !CONTAINS( Account_Name_as_String__c , "Apple Inc." ), ISPICKVAL ( StageName , "Closed/Won" ), ISCHANGED ( StageName ), $User.Bypass_Opportunity_Validation__c = False, OR( ISPICKVAL ( Type , "Existing Business" ), ISPICKVAL ( Type , "Renewal" ), ISPICKVAL ( Type , "Renewal Business" ) ) )

rules.description: new business closes opportunity with more than $250k ordered amount
new business closes opportunity with less than $250k ordered amount
Email alert for strategic marketing when a strategic account or a strategic marketing influenced account has an opportunity created
Submits the opportunity to Ad Manager as a campaign.

rules.fullName: Update Close Date on Closed Lost
Update Notify Accounting Checbkox to True

rules.description: Update Pledge Probability to 0% when opp is closed/lost
